outputs.output_descr: To establish the local capacities that are required for promotion of registered employment in textile and clothing sector through a market-oriented and sustainable manner. The Project will facilitate formalization of the textile and clothing labor force by conducting field studies, and delivering awareness-raising and training activities.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

project_descr: Promoting Registered Employment in Textile and Clothing
project_title: Promoting Registered Employment in Textile and Clothing
